author: AwesomeDragon97
long_description:
This texture pack changes the textures of four items that had inconsistent textures in the mod.

The items are: the steel gear, oil extract and the two types of chains.

To use this you need to have the Basic Materials mod: https://content.minetest.net/packages/mt-mods/basic_materials
name: better_basic_materials
short_description: Fixes the inconsistent textures in Basic Materials.
title: Better Basic Materials
